issue.title: Local/AWS docker simulation does not always start

content.raw: As long as you’re sending velocity commands to the correct topic, the robot should move.  Is there any way your Python script failed to pass a blocking statement before sending commands?  Do you have a printout to see when it begins sending commands to the robot?
content.html: As long as you’re sending velocity commands to the correct topic, the robot should move. Is there any way your Python script failed to pass a blocking statement before sending commands? Do you have a printout to see when it begins sending commands to the robot?
